marklogic.body: Â Visalus is pure garbage!Â Plus the Vi people claim Sucralose/Splenda isn't dangerous because the FDA approves it and it's in so many products and countries.Â So, the FDA has the public's health at it's best interest?Â Come on now... the FDA has approved other artificial sweeteners such as aspartame, the FDA approves drugs that are dangerous, the list goes on and on. The Visalus marketing materials are devious.Â They have one chart that compares their product vs other shakes.Â Of course there is only 90 calories per shake... it has 1/3 of the nutrition of most of the other shakes. Giving a 90 calorie shake to people of course is going to result in short term Weight loss, but it's not healthy Weight loss.Â Also look up the side effects of sucralose.Â Anybody foolish to sell this stuff is taking advantage of an epidemic.
